channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 4/16/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Human Agent-Only Mode Enhancement: The automatic switch to AI agents is now disabled in human agent-only mode, ensuring that human agents have sufficient time to address customer inquiries without interruption. Mobile Widget Display Optimization: Improved the display logic for mobile widgets, ensuring that only one widget icon is visible on mobile devices when a single widget is configured. 4/9/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Enhanced References feature: When users enable the References feature in the Advanced Settings page and have configured the Zendesk ticket search tool, if the AI agent’s response includes content from Zendesk tickets, the system will display the relevant ticket numbers and titles in the references area, making it easier to track information sources.
